article:
The 'Today sponge' is a brand of plastic contraceptive sponge saturated with a
spermicide nonoxynol-9 to prevent conception. Lockerm,
Sari (2005).
[http://books.google.com/books?id=cwyRGw7xSCAC&pg=PA367#v=onepage&q&f=false
Today Sponge.] The Complete Idiot's Guide to Amazing Sex, p. 367. Penguin, ISBN
978-1-59257-327-1 Within two years of its launch, Today had become the
largest selling over-the-counter female contraceptive in the United States, and
was soon rolled out into other markets. Day, Kathleen
(January 22, 1985). VLI to Begin Marketing `Today' Sponge in Britain. [[Los
Angeles Times]]
